text: Voot, Launched in March 2016, from the digital arms of Viacom 18. It's Viacom 18's advertising-led-video-on-demand platform. That is available as an app for iOS and Android Users, and a website for desktop consumption. Voot is available only in India. And hosts over 40,000 hours of video content that includes shows from channels like, MTV India, Nickelodeon, Colors TV. Content is also available in multi languages like, Kannada,Marathi, Bengali,Gujarati and Tamil. ==Related pages== * MTV * Nickelodeon * Colors Bangla * Pogo TV * Cartoon Network * Colors TV ==References== ==Other websites== * Owner Website * Official Website * Category:Indian entertainment websites
title: Voot
